fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Go on a hunt at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you go on a hunt, you will attack two random non-Pale Moon players.
- If you go on a hunt two nights in a row, you will instead attack three random players other than yourself.
- You may only go on a hunt twice.
- During the PMCS, you may go on a hunt infinite times and going on a hunt instead attacks four random non-Pale Moon players no matter how many nights in a row you go on a hunt.
